function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited health literacy and awareness","Impact":"Misinterpretation of health information, failure to recognize risks, and ineffective response to health emergencies.","Mitigation":"Health education, public awareness campaigns, and accessible health information.","Technologies":"Digital health platforms, online resources, and telemedicine.","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, and communities with limited access to information.","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Inadequate coordination of health care services","Impact":"Suboptimal care for people with multimorbidity and the elderly, leading to increased health risks and complications.","Mitigation":"Integration of primary, hospital, long-term, and social care, and person-centered care approaches.","Technologies":"Health information systems, telemedicine, and digital health records.","People":"People with multimorbidity, elderly individuals, and caregivers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, policymakers, and community care providers."},{"Description":"Lack of effective local response strategies","Impact":"Inability to respond appropriately to local epidemiological patterns and public health emergencies, leading to further spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Development of tailored local strategies based on epidemiological data and community response capabilities.","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance systems, digital health platforms, and community health communication tools.","People":"Local communities, public health authorities, and epidemiologists.","Owner":"Local health departments, public health agencies, and community leaders."}]}
